languages.text: "Знаете что? Пошли вы на хер, дорогие соратники. С вами липко и страшно, как в полузатопленной траншее. Хотите трындеть о том, как вас скоро прикончат — валяйте. А я лучше пойду и сама кого-нибудь убью".

"You know what? Screw the lot of you. I've seen better morale at the bottom of a half-flooded trench! If you want to harp on about how you'll all be killed soon, fill your boots. Me, I'd rather go and kill someone else."
languages.original_text: "Знаете что? Пошли вы на хер, дорогие соратники. С вами липко и страшно, как в полузатопленной траншее. Хотите трындеть о том, как вас скоро прикончат — валяйте. А я лучше пойду и сама кого-нибудь убью".

traits.locale_text: "You know what? Screw the lot of you. I've seen better morale at the bottom of a half-flooded trench! If you want to harp on about how you'll all be killed soon, fill your boots. Me, I'd rather go and kill someone else."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know what? Screw the lot of you. I've seen better morale at the bottom of a half-flooded trench! If you want to harp on about how you'll all be killed soon, fill your boots. Me, I'd rather go and kill someone else."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know what? Screw the lot of you. I've seen better morale at the bottom of a half-flooded trench! If you want to harp on about how you'll all be killed soon, fill your boots. Me, I'd rather go and kill someone else."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You know what? Screw the lot of you. I've seen better morale at the bottom of a half-flooded trench! If you want to harp on about how you'll all be killed soon, fill your boots. Me, I'd rather go and kill someone else."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “要我说，去你们的吧！就算是被水淹了一半的战壕里，那些士兵也没像你们这么灰心丧气！如果你们打算继续唉声叹气，说什么大家马上就要没命了，那就赶紧洗干净脖子吧。至于我，我还打算再杀几个呢。”
languages.original_text: "You know what? Screw the lot of you. I've seen better morale at the bottom of a half-flooded trench! If you want to harp on about how you'll all be killed soon, fill your boots. Me, I'd rather go and kill someone else."

traits.locale_text: “要我说，去你们的吧！就算是被水淹了一半的战壕里，那些士兵也没像你们这么灰心丧气！如果你们打算继续唉声叹气，说什么大家马上就要没命了，那就赶紧洗干净脖子吧。至于我，我还打算再杀几个呢。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたに何がわかるっていうの？くそくらえよ。あたしは半分浸水した塹壕の底で、もっと士気が高い連中を見たことだってある！あんたら全員、もうすぐ殺されるんだよ、しっかりしなよ。あたしはむしろ、誰かを殺しに行きたいくらいさ」
languages.original_text: "You know what? Screw the lot of you. I've seen better morale at the bottom of a half-flooded trench! If you want to harp on about how you'll all be killed soon, fill your boots. Me, I'd rather go and kill someone else."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたに何がわかるっていうの？くそくらえよ。あたしは半分浸水した塹壕の底で、もっと士気が高い連中を見たことだってある！あんたら全員、もうすぐ殺されるんだよ、しっかりしなよ。あたしはむしろ、誰かを殺しに行きたいくらいさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Sabéis qué? Que os den a todos. ¡He visto moral más alta en el fondo de una trinchera medio inundada! Si queréis regodearos en cómo pronto os matarán a todos, pues con vuestro pan os lo comáis. Yo prefiero ir a hacer que muera otro».
languages.original_text: "You know what? Screw the lot of you. I've seen better morale at the bottom of a half-flooded trench! If you want to harp on about how you'll all be killed soon, fill your boots. Me, I'd rather go and kill someone else."

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabéis qué? Que os den a todos. ¡He visto moral más alta en el fondo de una trinchera medio inundada! Si queréis regodearos en cómo pronto os matarán a todos, pues con vuestro pan os lo comáis. Yo prefiero ir a hacer que muera otro».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous savez quoi ? Allez tous vous faire voir. J'ai vu plus de positivité au fond d'une tranchée à moitié inondée ! Si vous voulez continuer à vous morfondre sous prétexte que vous allez bientôt mourir, faites-vous plaisir. Moi, je préfère aller tuer quelqu'un d'autre. »
languages.original_text: "You know what? Screw the lot of you. I've seen better morale at the bottom of a half-flooded trench! If you want to harp on about how you'll all be killed soon, fill your boots. Me, I'd rather go and kill someone else."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez quoi ? Allez tous vous faire voir. J'ai vu plus de positivité au fond d'une tranchée à moitié inondée ! Si vous voulez continuer à vous morfondre sous prétexte que vous allez bientôt mourir, faites-vous plaisir. Moi, je préfère aller tuer quelqu'un d'autre. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr was? Ihr könnt mich alle mal. Da habe ich ja schon in halb überschwemmten Gräben bessere Moral erlebt! Wenn Ihr weiter klagen wollt, dass wir alle bald sterben müssen, dann macht nur. Ich hingegen gehe lieber los und töte jemand anderen."
languages.original_text: "You know what? Screw the lot of you. I've seen better morale at the bottom of a half-flooded trench! If you want to harp on about how you'll all be killed soon, fill your boots. Me, I'd rather go and kill someone else."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr was? Ihr könnt mich alle mal. Da habe ich ja schon in halb überschwemmten Gräben bessere Moral erlebt! Wenn Ihr weiter klagen wollt, dass wir alle bald sterben müssen, dann macht nur. Ich hingegen gehe lieber los und töte jemand anderen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Biliyor musunuz? Topunuzun aklını karışlayayım. Yarısını sel basmış hendeklerin dibinde milleti daha moralli görmüşümdür! Yakında nasıl da öldürüleceğiniz üzerinde durmayı bu kadar çok istiyorsanız keyfini sürün. Ben gidip başka birilerini öldürmeyi tercih ederim."
languages.original_text: "You know what? Screw the lot of you. I've seen better morale at the bottom of a half-flooded trench! If you want to harp on about how you'll all be killed soon, fill your boots. Me, I'd rather go and kill someone else."

traits.locale_text: "Biliyor musunuz? Topunuzun da aklını karışlayayım. Yarısını sel basmış hendeklerin dibinde milletin moralinin daha yüksek olduğunu görmüşümdür! Hepinizin yakında nasıl da öldürüleceği üzerinde durmayı bu kadar çok istiyorsanız, keyfini sürün. Ben gidip başka birilerini öldürmeyi tercih ederim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
